## StackProps interface

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface StackProps extends BlockProps
```

**Extends:** [BlockProps](./extensions.blockprops.md)

## Properties

| Property                                                               | Modifiers | Type                                             | Description                                                             |
| ---------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------ | ----------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [direction](./extensions.stackprops.direction.md)                      |           | [StackDirection](./extensions.stackdirection.md) | The direction in which items are going to stack.                        |
| [horizontalAlignment?](./extensions.stackprops.horizontalalignment.md) |           | [StackAlignment](./extensions.stackalignment.md) | _(Optional)_ How items should be aligned horizontally.                  |
| [inline?](./extensions.stackprops.inline.md)                           |           | boolean                                          | _(Optional)_ Render as an inline-level element or as a block-level one? |
| [itemGap](./extensions.stackprops.itemgap.md)                          |           | [SpacingUnit](./extensions.spacingunit.md)       | The spacing between items in the stack.                                 |
| [verticalAlignment?](./extensions.stackprops.verticalalignment.md)     |           | [StackAlignment](./extensions.stackalignment.md) | _(Optional)_ How items should be aligned vertically.                    |
